name: Rapid Change ATC
author: ncSender
description: Rapid tool change workflow helper for automatic tool changers.

FAILED_UNLOAD_TOOL.title: Unload Failed
FAILED_UNLOAD_TOOL.message: Failed to unload the bit. Please manually remove the bit, then click "Continue" to proceed or "Abort" to cancel.

FAILED_LOAD_TOOL.title: Load Failed
FAILED_LOAD_TOOL.message: Failed to load the bit. Please manually install the bit, then click "Continue" to proceed or "Abort" to cancel.

MANUAL_UNLOAD_TOOL.title: Manual Unload
MANUAL_UNLOAD_TOOL.message: Please remove the current bit, then click "Continue" to proceed or "Abort" to cancel.

MANUAL_LOAD_TOOL.title: Manual Load
MANUAL_LOAD_TOOL.message: Please install the new bit securely, then click "Continue" to proceed or "Abort" to cancel.
